I haven't downloaded this or installed it, but most errors involving Windows 7 (I'm using a 64bit version) that can't be resolved through granting normal program permissions (ie run in Admin mode or with compatibility) can be solved by disabling Data Execution Prevention (DEP) on that specific exe.

My posts never work when I include links, so google disabling dep + windows 7. You *never* want to do a full-on disabling of DEP. It's there for a reason.

Failing that, I find that sometimes copying troublesome .dll files into the same folder as the executable sometimes solves problems as well.

Well, I installed the game straight up and used the crack. Works fine for me, aside from the issues associated with the game because the coding seems to be terrible in general.

Sometimes a registry cleaning helps with errors such at the one being reported.

I'm running it with full admin privs and compat for XP SP3.
